name: Noble Energy

interests: Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Our significant world-class discoveries in the Eastern Mediterranean provide an exceptional opportunity to deliver energy security and economic development for Cyprus and the broader Eastern Mediterranean region.
Main areas that EU initiatives, policies and legislative files that are of interest to Noble energy include but are not limited to: Energy Union, Energy Security, Gas Infrastructure Developments, European Neighborhood Policy, EU Air Policy, Offshore Oil and Gas safety, Environment
